testSteps.action: Click on the 'About' navigation menu item
Verify that the About page contains content about the application
testSteps.expectedResult: About page displays information about the QA Test Application

testSteps.action: Verify that the navigation menu is still visible on the About page
testSteps.expectedResult: Navigation menu with Home, Products, About, Contact, and Login is visible

testSteps.action: Click on 'Home' to navigate back to the homepage
testSteps.expectedResult: Successfully navigates back to the homepage with 'Welcome to our QA Test Application' heading visible
